title: 10 Tips Learned from Running A Python [Pyramid] Web App in Production
description:
"10 Tips Learned from Running A Python [Pyramid] Web App in Production" by: Michael Kennedy

Are you new to running web apps in production? Do you have that nagging feeling that you should improve the ways you structure, deploy, and develop your app? Want to see some lessons learned from running a group of Pyramid web apps on a cluster of Linux servers? Join the talk as Michael Kennedy, founder of Talk Python, as he shares his top 10 list of lessons learned running a variety of web apps over the past 5 years.

This talk is open to all frameworks. Whether you use Pyramid, Flask, or Django, most of the tips and tricks will apply to your web apps you're building and deploying today.

Recorded at the 2020 Python Web Conference (https://2020.pythonwebconf.com)
